data.name: TrainFormation
data.detailed_description:
TrainFormation is a simple, fast-paced puzzle game created by one student as a university project. Place rails in front of an ever-accelerating train to cross procedurally generated levels, reach stations, collect power ups and make it as far as you can!

Build a path for the train

Swap hexagonal tiles to create a path for the train. Make sure to find the matching rails and terrain, or the train will not make it through!
    ⠀

Reach stations and collect power ups

Make it to a station and take a moment to breathe. Use specific rail tiles to collect power ups to help you in your toughest moments!
    ⠀

Make it as far as you can

Reach new levels and face the difficult terrain. Hold on tight as the train continues to accelerate!
    ⠀

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 520
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
